original_text: For by now I could have stretched out my hand and struck you and your people with a plague that would have wiped you off the earth.
korean_text: 내가 손을 펴서 돌림병으로 너와 네 백성을 쳤더라면 네가 세상에서 끊어졌을 것이나

sentences.original_text: For by now I could have stretched out my hand
sentences.korean_translation: 이미 내가 손을 뻗었을 수도 있었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and struck you and your people with a plague
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신과 당신 백성을 재앙으로 칠 수도 있었고

sentences.original_text: that would have wiped you off the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그 재앙은 당신을 땅에서 멸망시켰을 것입니다
